author: odoo
code:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-



{
    'name': 'Dates on Sales Order',
    'version': '1.1',
    'category': 'Sales',
    'description': """
Add additional date information to the sales order.
===================================================

You can add the following additional dates to a sales order:
------------------------------------------------------------
    * Requested Date (will be used as the expected date on pickings)
    * Commitment Date
    * Effective Date
""",
    'website': 'https://www.odoo.com/page/crm',
    'depends': ['sale_stock'],
    'data': ['views/sale_order_views.xml'],
}
comments: add additional date information sales order                                                       you add following additional dates sales order                                                                     requested date (will used expected date pickings)       commitment date       effective date            coding  utf 8        part odoo  see license file full copyright licensing details
